subject: Re: Order #SSN5506 confirmed
description_text:
Hi guys,

I know ordering between the years was probably not ideal - but is there a
delivery update already on my order by chance?

Online I can not see a status change since 29.12 when placing the order.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best,
Jasper

conversations.body_text: Hi Jasper Klos,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510418405489
